General.Name: Sichuan Shuangma Cement Co Ltd
General.Description: Sichuan Hexie Shuangma Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells cement and other related products in China. The company offers cement, commodity clinker, aggregates, etc. that are used in roads, railways, airports, power stations, real estate, municipal infrastructure, and rural construction. It also engages in private equity investment management activities. The company was formerly known as SICHUAN SHUANGMA CEMENT CO., Ltd and changed its name to Sichuan Hexie Shuangma Co., Ltd. in February 2022. Sichuan Hexie Shuangma Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Chengdu, China.
General.Address: Room 2, Chengdu Int Finance Center, Chengdu, China, 610020
